sourcesContent:
import styles from './GameDetail.module.css' import { useEffect } from "react" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { getGameById } from "../../Redux/Actions" function GameDetail () { const gameDetail = useSelector(initialState => initialState.gameDetail) const dispatch = useDispatch() const platforms = gameDetail.platforms.slice('') console.log(platforms) const {id} = useParams() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getGameById(id)) }, []) return(

{gameDetail?.name}

Release Date: {gameDetail.released}

Rating: {gameDetail.rating}

  • {platforms}

    • Devs: {gameDetail.developer}

    Metacritic score:{gameDetail.metacritic}

    Tags: {gameDetail.tags}

    Buy it on: {gameDetail.stores}

    Description: {gameDetail.description}

    ) } export default GameDetail
